name: Speedrun Timer
description: Just a speedrun timer for platformer levels.

issues.info: Report any issues to our repository!

color.name: Timer Color
color.description: The color of the speedrun timer.

format-minutes.name: Format Minutes
format-minutes.description: Whether to format the timer label to include minutes.

platformer-only.name: Platformer Only
platformer-only.description: Only allow use of the timer in platformer levels.

checkpoint-split.name: Checkpoint Split
checkpoint-split.description: Create a split when the player activates a checkpoint.
checkpoint-split.enable-if-description: This setting is only available in platformer levels.

reset-death.name: Reset on Death
reset-death.description: Reset the speedrun timer when the player dies.

pause-complete.name: Pause on Complete
pause-complete.description: Pause the speedrun timer when the player completes the level.
